item.customportalmod.chromatic_iron_prop:
Sleek and colorful, providing moderate
speed with improved durability and
efficiency.
item.customportalmod.power_engine.descri:
Powerful and efficient. Though it operates
at a slower pace, it excels in handling
heavy loads.
item.customportalmod.turbo_engine.descri:
High performance powerhouse with a built-in
turbo boost for unmatched speed and
acceleration.
